OxfMert248.Transcription:
ȝre woys mosthe wyt thowthnyth and day make me til morne
                    allesey þat sal Ine nottewen and wore and wydir I be and
                    salle
OxfMert248.Editions:
Heffernan,  Thomas J. 
             “Unpublished Middle English Verses on ‘The Three Sorrowful
                Things.’” 
             Neuphilologische Mitteilungen
         83 (1982): 31-3: 33.
